{{also|juli|julí|júlí|jùlí}} ==Catalan== ===Etymology=== From {{der|ca|la|Iūlius}}. ===Pronunciation=== * {{ca-IPA}} ===Proper noun=== {{ca-proper noun|m}} # {{given name|ca|male|from=Latin|eq=Julius}} ---- ==German== ===Alternative forms=== * {{l|de|Julei}} {{qualifier|almost exclusively in speech; in order to better distinguish from ''{{l|de|Juni}}''}} ===Pronunciation=== * {{IPA|de|/ˈjuːli/}} * {{audio|de|De-Juli.ogg|audio}} ===Noun=== {{de-noun|m|Julis|gen2=Juli|Julis}} # {{l|en|July}} ====Declension==== {{de-decl-noun-m|(s)|s}} ====Synonyms==== * {{l|de|Heumonat}} {{q|archaic}} [[Category:de:Months]] ---- ==Indonesian== {{wikipedia||lang=id}} ===Etymology=== From {{bor|id|nl|juli}}, from {{der|id|la|iūlius}}, from {{m|la|Iuppiter}}, from {{der|id|ine-pro|*dyeu-pəter-}}. ===Pronunciation=== * {{IPA|id|/ˈd͡ʒu.li/}} * {{hyphenation|id|Ju|li}} ===Proper noun=== {{id-proper noun}} # [[July]] ====Alternative forms==== * {{l|ms|Julai}} {{q|Standard Malay}} ====Coordinate terms==== {{Months in Indonesian}} ===Further reading=== * {{R:KBBI Daring}} [[Category:id:Gregorian calendar months]] ---- ==Luxembourgish== ===Pronunciation=== * {{IPA|lb|/ˈjuːli/|/ˈʒuːli/}} ===Proper noun=== {{head|lb|proper noun|g=m}} # [[July]] ===See also=== * {{list:Gregorian calendar months/lb}}
